Uses of Interface
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.Session

  • Packages that use Session 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context
    Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
    Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.

    • Uses of Session in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context

      Methods in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context that return Session 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Session InfinitumContext.getSession(InfinitumContext.DataSource source)
      Retrieves a new Session instance for the configured data source.
      Session AbstractContext.getSession(InfinitumContext.DataSource source) 

    • Uses of Session in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm

      Methods in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm that return Session 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Session Session.beginTransaction()
      Starts a new database transaction.
      Session Session.close()
      Closes the Session and cleans up any resources.
      Session Session.commit()
      Commits the current transaction.
      Session Session.execute(java.lang.String sql)
      Executes the given SQL non-query on the database, meaning no result is expected.
      Session Session.open()
      Opens the Session for transactions.
      Session Session.recycleCache()
      Recycles the Session cache, effectively reclaiming its memory.
      <T> Session Session.registerDeserializer(java.lang.Class<T> type, Deserializer<T> deserializer)
      Registers the given Deserializer for the given Class type.
      <T> Session Session.registerTypeAdapter(java.lang.Class<T> type, TypeAdapter<T> adapter)
      Registers the given TypeAdapter for the specified Class with this Session instance.
      Session Session.rollback()
      Rolls back the current transaction.
      Session Session.setAutocommit(boolean autocommit)
      Sets the autocommit value for this Session.
      Session Session.setCacheSize(int mCacheSize)
      Sets the Session cache capacity in terms of how many Objects it can store.

      Concrete implementation of RestfulSession for web services which send responses back as JSON.

      Session implementation for communicating with a RESTful web service using domain objects.

      Concrete implementation of RestfulSession for web services which send responses back as XML.
